author: stsp
msg: On the tree-conflicts branch, add support code for storing
tree conflict information in the entries file.
None of this is actually being called by the proper Subversion
code yet. The code has been unit-tested though.
new fields with two asterisks, not one.
'tree_conflict_report' in order to avoid confusion between
tree conflict meta data (part of svn_wc_conflict_description_t)
stored in the entries file, and human-readable tree conflict
descriptions that live outside the adm area in the user's working
copy. The human-readable description of a tree conflict will
from now on be referred to as a "tree conflict report".
to aid debugging. Uninitialized structs are really confusing.
* (select_their_phrase): Add a return statement to end of function
body to shut the MS VC compiler up.
Corrections to comment on escaping the victim_path in the entries file.
updated when this file was renamed.
SVN_WC__CONFLICT_REASON_MISSING): New constants for fields in tree
conflict description stored in entries file.
(svn_wc__add_tree_conflict_data): Added new argument for log accumulator.
Track rename of member in svn_wc_entry_t.
Track rename of member in svn_wc_entry_t.
(svn_wc_conflicted_p2): Track rename of member in svn_wc_entry_t.

author: markphip
msg: Followup to r27875.  Add logic to tell whether the path being diffed is the
same as the path the diff paths should be relative to.  In that scenario,
specify a path of '.' in the diff output, instead of throwing an error.
(display_prop_diffs, diff_content_changed): Updated for new path check.
(testDiff): Test scenario where path and relative path are the same.

author: stsp
msg: On the tree-conflicts branch, rename two files.
Renamed, was treeconflicts.c. Track new name of treeconflicts.h.

author: dlr
msg: (svn_cl__mergeinfo): Use numeric comparison for numeric return values.
